actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1652) to provide extended unemployment benefits to displaced workers, and to make other improvements in the unemployment insurance system.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1652 (unemployment benefits extension).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1652) to provide extended unemployment benefits to displaced workers, and to make other improvements in the unemployment insurance system.
